source_caption_data.pre_caption: Against a solid black background, a Jenga tower made of light-colored wooden blocks is shown reassembling itself from a collapsed pile into a fully constructed tower on a dark brown wooden table. To the left of the tower sit two white keyboard keys, one with "Ctrl" and the other with "Z" printed on them. A man wearing glasses and a patterned t-shirt is seated at the table, and once the tower is complete, he reaches out to carefully remove a single block from the structure.
